Verses: 1 baabilon Raajaavaagiya Pelshaadhsaarin Mudhalaam Varushaththile Dhaaniyel Oru Soppanaththaiyum Than Padukkaiyinmel Than Thalaiyil Thondrina Dharisanangalaiyum Kandaan. Pinbu Avan Andha Soppanaththai Ezhudhi, Kaariyangalin Thogaiyai Vivariththaan.
2 dhaaniyel Sonnadhu: Raaththirikaalaththil Enakku Undaana Dharisanaththile Naan Kandadhu Ennavendraal: Idho, Vaanaththin Naalu Kaatrugalum Periya Samuththiraththinmel Adiththadhu.
3 appozhudhu Vevveru Roobamulla Naalu Periya Mirugangal Samuththiraththilirundhu Ezhumbina.

4 mundhinadhu Singaththaippola Irundhadhu; Adharkuk Kazhugin Settaigal Undaayirundhadhu; Naan Paarththukkondirukkaiyil, Adhin Iragugal Pidungappattadhu; Adhu Tharaiyilirundhu Edukkappattu, Manushanaippola Irandu Kaalinmel Nimirndhu Nirkumpadi Seyyappattadhu; Manusha Irudhayam Adharkuk Kodukkappattadhu.

5 pinbu, Karadikku Oppaagiya Vere Irandaam Mirugaththaik Kanden; Adhu Oru Pakkamaai Saaindhunindru, Than Vaayin Parkalukkulle Moondru Vilaavelumbugalaik Kavvikkondirundhadhu; Ezhumbi Vegu Maamsam Thinnendru Adharku Sollappattadhu.

6 adhin Pinbu, Sivingiyaippolirukkira Veroru Mirugaththaik Kanden; Adhin Mudhuginmel Patchiyinsettaigal Naalu Irundhadhu; Andha Mirugaththukku Naalu Thalaigalum Undaayirundhadhu; Adharku Aalugai Alikkappattadhu.

7 adharkuppinbu, Raaththarisanangalil Naalaam Mirugaththaik Kanden; Adhu Kediyum Bayangaramum Magaa Balaththadhumaayirundhadhu; Adharkup Periya Iruppupparkal Irundhadhu; Adhu Norukkip Patchiththu, Meedhiyaanadhaith Than Kaalgalaal Midhiththuppottadhu; Adhu Thanakku Munnirundha Ellaa Mirugangalaippaarkkilum Vetruruvamaayirundhadhu, Adharkup Paththuk Kombugal Irundhadhu.

8 andhak Kombugalai Naan Gavaniththirukkaiyil, Idho, Avaigalukku Idaiyile Veroru Sinna Kombu Ezhumbitru; Adharku Munbaaga Mundhinakombugalil Moondru Pidungappattadhu; Idho, Andhak Kombile Manushakangalukku Oppaana Kangalum Perumaiyaanavaigalaip Pesum Vaayum Irundhadhu.

9 naan Paarththukkondirukkaiyil, Singaasanangal Vaikkappattadhu; Neenda Aayusullavar Veetrirundhaar; Avarudaiya Vasthiram Uraindha Mazhaiyaippolavum, Avarudaiya Sirasin Mayir Venmaiyaagavum Panjaippola Thuppuravaagavum Irundhadhu; Avarudaiya Singaasanam Akkinijuvaalaiyum, Adhin Sakkarangal Erigira Neruppumaayirundhadhu.

10 akkini Nadhi Avar Sannidhiyilirundhu Purappattu Odinadhu; Aayiramaayiramper Avarai Seviththaargal; Kodaakodiper Avarukku Munbaaga Nindraargal; Nyaayasangam Utkaarndhadhu; Pusthagangal Thirakkappattadhu.

11 appozhudhu Naan Paarththen; Naan Paarththukondirukkaiyil Andhak Kombu Perumaiyaana Pechchugalaip Pesinadhinimiththam Andha Mirugam Kolaiseyyappattadhu; Adhin Udal Azhikkappattu, Erigira Akkinikku Oppukkodukkappattadhu.
12 matra Mirugangaludaiya Aalugaiyovendraal, Avaigalai Vittu Neekkappattadhu; Aanaalum, Avaigalukkuk Kaalamum Samayamum Aagumattum Avaigal Uyirode Irukkumpadi Kattalaiyidappattadhu.

13 raaththarisanangalile Naan Paarththukkondirukkaiyil, Idho, Manushakumaaranudaiya Saayalaana Oruvar Vaanaththu Megangaludane Vandhaar; Avar Neenda Aayusullavar Idamattum Vandhu, Avar Sameebaththil Konduvarappattaar.

14 sagala Janangalum Jaadhiyaarum, Baashaikkaararum Avaraiye Sevikkumpadi, Avarukkuk Karththaththuvamum Magimaiyum Raajareegamum Kodukkappattadhu; Avarudaiya Karththaththuvam Neengaadha Niththiya Karththaththuvamum Avarudaiya Raajyam Azhiyaadhadhumaayirukkum.
15 dhaaniyelaagiya Naan En Dhegaththinul En Aaviyile Sanjalappatten; En Thalaiyil Thondrina Dharisanangal Ennaik Kalangappanninadhu.

16 sameebaththil Nirkiravargalil Oruvanidaththil Naan Poi, Idhan Porul Ellaavatraiyum Enakku Sollumpadi Avanai Vendikkonden; Avan Andhak Kaariyangalin Arththaththai Enakku Ariviththuchchonnadhu Ennavendraal:
17 andha Naalu Periya Mirugangalum Boomiyilirundhu Ezhumbugira Naalu Raajaakkal.
18 aanaalum Unnadhamaanavarudaiya Parisuththavaangal Raajareegaththaippetru, Endrendraikkumulla Sadhaakaalangalilum Raajyaththai Sudhandhariththukkolvaargal Endraan.

19 appozhudhu Matravaigalaiyellaam Paarkkilum Vetruruvum Kediyumulladhumaai, Iruppup Parkalum, Vengala Nagangalumudaiyadhaai Norukkip Patchiththu, Meedhiyaanadhaith Than Kaalgalaal Midhiththuppottadhumaayirundha Naalaam Mirugaththaik Kuriththum,

20 adhin Thalaimelulla Paththukkombugalaikkuriththum Thanakku Munbaaga Moondru Kombugal Vizhundhupoga Ezhumbinadhumaai, Kangalaiyum Perumaiyaanavaigalaip Pesum Vaayaiyumudaiyadhumaai, Matravaigalaippaarkkilum Barumanaagath Thondrinadhumaayirundha Andha Vere Kombaikkuriththum, Avatrin Porulai Ariya Manadhaayirundhen.
21 neenda Aayusullavar Varumattaagavum, Nyaayavisaarippu Unnadhamaanavarudaiya Parisuththavaangalukkuk Kodukkappattu, Parisuththavaangal Raajyaththai Sudhandhariththukkollum Kaalam Varumattaagavum,
22 indhak
